steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'View' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Macros' group, click on the 'Macros' button.
In the 'Macros' dialog box, click on the 'Create' button.
In the 'Create Macro' dialog box, enter a name for the macro.
Click on the 'OK' button to create the macro.
Write the desired VBA code for the macro.
Click on the 'Save' button to save the macro.
